Package org.vraptor.converter.basic

Class Summary
BasicConverters Utility for registering all primitive and primitive-wrappers converters for xpathing parameters.
EnumConverter Basic String to Enumeration converter.
LocaleBigDecimalConverter Locale based BigDecimal converter.
LocaleCalendarDateConverter Locale based calendar/date converter.
LocaleConverter Converter capable of dealing with instances of java.util.Locale.
PrimitiveBooleanConverter Primitive boolean converter.
PrimitiveByteConverter Primitive byte converter.
PrimitiveCharConverter Simple char converter.
PrimitiveDoubleConverter Primitive double converter.
PrimitiveFloatConverter Primitive float converter.
PrimitiveIntConverter Primitive integer converter.
PrimitiveLongConverter Primitive long converter.
PrimitiveShortConverter Primitive short converter.
SimpleBigDecimalConverter Simple BigDecimal converter.
SimpleBooleanConverter Simple Boolean (wrapper class) converter.
SimpleByteConverter Simple byte converter.
SimpleCharacterConverter Converts to Character.
SimpleDoubleConverter Simple double converter.
SimpleFloatConverter Simple float converter.
SimpleIntegerConverter Simple integer converter.
SimpleLongConverter Simple long converter.
SimpleShortConverter Simple short converter.
StringConverter String converter
